output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, the post includes "CMF: 11240002" at the end, indicating it's electoral propaganda material.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, specifically mentions "Nicolae Ciucă" who is a presidential candidate (Position 4), along with mentions of PNL and Ilie Bolojan.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid Facebook/Instagram advertisement targeting a potential audience of 1001-5000 people, clearly addressing the general public.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, this is clearly electoral content that: - Promotes PNL's vision and program - Explicitly asks for votes ("Votați PNL") - Presents campaign promises and party objectives - Uses electoral slogans and campaign hashtags
5. Journalism: No, this is not journalistic content. It's clearly campaign material promoting a political party and its candidates.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication with a CMF number, structured as campaign material.
The post includes electoral content for both: - Parliamentary elections (which is allowed) - Presidential elections (by mentioning Nicolae Ciucă as President, which is not allowed after the propaganda period)

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Makes explicit electoral promises - Calls for votes - Promotes both parliamentary and presidential candidates - Is a paid advertisement targeting the general public
conclusion.message-for-police: Partidul Național Liberal (PNL), prin intermediul paginii "Ucu Dima", pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale pentru candidatul prezidențial Nicolae Ciucă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie. Postarea cu ID-ul 1857303024677817 conține referiri directe la candidatura prezidențială ("Cu Nicolae Ciucă Președinte"), fiind promovată ca reclamă plătită pe Facebook și Instagram după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Materialul include număr CMF (11240002) și reprezintă propagandă electorală conform Art. 36(7) din Legea 334/2006, având obiectiv electoral explicit și adresându-se publicului larg.
